roleset.name: constituting a problem

role.descr: further description of the nature of the problem
problematic for whom, entity suffering due to problem

example.name: problematic-j: args 0, 1
example.text: This approach is problematic of the solutions' inherent performance limitations and scalability bottlenecks.
example.arg: of the solutions' inherent performance limitations and scalability bottlenecks.

example.name: problem-n
example.text: problems with what sounded to be an ileus.
